required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational, Long-term Extension Study for Participants of Prior VY-AADC01 Studies
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational, Long-Term Extension Study for Participants in Prior VY-AADC01 Clinical Studies

brief_summary.textblock: An extension study for participants who have completed a prior VY-AADC01 clinical study

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 years from VY-AADC01 administration
primary_outcome.description: Long-term safety of VY-AADC01 as measured by Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 years from VY-AADC01 administration
secondary_outcome.description: Continued expression of AADC as measured by [18F]-fluorodopa (F-Dopa) positron emission tomography (PET)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 years from VY-AADC01 administration
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in PD medications, measured as levodopa equivalent dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in motor function as assessed by Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 years from VY-AADC01 administration
secondary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline in motor function as assessed by UPDRS, in both "Off" and "On" medication states

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in "Off" and "On" time as recorded by the participant in Parkinson's Disease (PD) diary
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 years from VY-AADC01 administration
secondary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline based on the PD Diary: "OFF" time; "ON" time without troublesome dyskinesia; "ON" time without dyskinesia; "ON" time with troublesome dyskinesia; and "ON" time with non-troublesome dyskinesia

arm_group.description: Participants who have completed participation in VY-AADC01 clinical studies (PD-1101 or PD-1102) will be invited to participate in this extension study

study_pop.textblock: Participants from prior VY-AADC01 clinical studies will be eligible for the extension study

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
1. Completed participation in the PD-1101 or PD-1102 clinical study of VY-AADC01 gene therapy
Key Exclusion Criteria:
None

reference.citation: Christine CW, Bankiewicz KS, Van Laar AD, Richardson RM, Ravina B, Kells AP, Boot B, Martin AJ, Nutt J, Thompson ME, Larson PS. Magnetic resonance imaging-guided phase 1 trial of putaminal AADC gene therapy for Parkinson's disease. Ann Neurol. 2019 May;85(5):704-714. doi: 10.1002/ana.25450. Epub 2019 Mar 26.

Richardson RM, Bankiewicz KS, Christine CW, Van Laar AD, Gross RE, Lonser R, Factor SA, Kostyk SK, Kells AP, Ravina B, Larson PS. Data-driven evolution of neurosurgical gene therapy delivery in Parkinson's disease. J Neurol Neurosurg Psychiatry. 2020 Nov;91(11):1210-1218. doi: 10.1136/jnnp-2020-322904. Epub 2020 Jul 30. Review.

Nutt JG, Curtze C, Hiller A, Anderson S, Larson PS, Van Laar AD, Richardson RM, Thompson ME, Sedkov A, Leinonen M, Ravina B, Bankiewicz KS, Christine CW. Aromatic L-Amino Acid Decarboxylase Gene Therapy Enhances Levodopa Response in Parkinson's Disease. Mov Disord. 2020 May;35(5):851-858. doi: 10.1002/mds.27993. Epub 2020 Mar 9.
